definitions.body: contempt springing from pride and wickedness Job 31:34, Ps 123:3, Ps 123:4 (‖[[לַעַג]]); joined in one adverb. phr. with [[גאוה]] Ps 31:19 ´[[וׇב]] ´[[בְּג]]; springing from prosperity and ease Job 12:5; = object of contempt Ge 38:23, Pr 12:8; ‖[[חֶרְפָּה]] Ps 119:22, Pr 18:3.
judicial, poured out ([[שׁפך]]) by God, in judgment Job 12:21 = Ps 107:40.
